success.message: You can now proceed to bridge {token}.

tx.message: Track the {token} token approval status on the explorer here.

success.message: Your funds are being prepared for claiming on CoreRollup.

timeout.message: It took longer than expected to process your transaction, check your wallet for the status.
timeout.title: Timed out

tx.message: Your bridge transaction was confirmed. The transaction can take a few minutes to complete, track it here.

alerts.not_enough_funds: You do not have enough ETH to cover the processing fee and transaction fee. Please add more ETH to your wallet (>= 0.0015 ETH).
alerts.slow_bridging: Please note: Bridging to L1 will take around 24hrs!
alerts.smart_contract_wallet: It seems you are using a smart contract wallet. Please double check that the recipient matches your wallet on the destination or change it accordingly.
alerts.wrapped_eth: You are bridging wrapped ETH. Please be aware that un-wrapping will only work on the original chain of the token, NOT on the destination.

fungible.recipient: Set up information on the recipient blockchain.

nft.recipient: Set up information on the recipient blockchain.

errors.amount_exceeds_quota: This amount exceeds the quota. Please lower the amount.

approve_error.message: We encountered an issue while trying to approve this token.
approve_error.title: Approval failed

approve_rejected.title: Request to approve rejected by user

not_received.message: The message is not proven and cannot be claimed right now.
not_received.title: Not received

not_found.message: Token not found. Are you on the right network?

insufficient_allowance.message: Please increase your allowance to proceed with bridging.
insufficient_allowance.title: Insufficient allowance

insufficient_balance.message: Sorry, your wallet balance is too low to cover this token.
insufficient_balance.title: Insufficient wallet balance

errors.invalid_proof_provided: An invalid proof was provided for this action.

no_allowance_required.message: You already have sufficient allowance for this request.
no_allowance_required.title: Allowance already set

errors.no_decimals_allowed: Decimals are not supported for this token
errors.not_the_owner_of_all: You must be the owner of all tokens

send_erc20_error.message: There was an issue attempting to send ERC20 token.
send_erc20_error.title: Failed to send

transaction_timeout.message: Transaction timed out. Try refreshing the page and retry
transaction_timeout.title: Timed out

unknown_error.message: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again.

import.no_nft_found: We could not find any NFTs. Please try again or consider adding them manually.

scan_screen.description: Don't see your NFTs? Try adding them manually!
scan_screen.title: Your NFTs ({number} items)

approve.description: Before initiating the bridge, it's necessary to first approve the transfer.
approve.pending: Please wait for your transaction to be picked up

success.message: Your approve transaction was confirmed. The transaction can take a few minutes to complete, track it here.

approve.title: Approval required

approved.description_eth: You can now continue to bridge your funds
approved.description_token: All tokens are approved, you can now bridge your assets
approved.title: Proceed to bridge

success.message: Your bridge transaction was confirmed. The transaction can take a few minutes to complete, track it here.

timeout.message: The network experiences heavy load and it took longer than expected for your transaction to process. You can track the status on the explorer and in your wallet.

usdt_approval.info: You have previously approved a lower amount of USDT. To adjust the approval, you must first reset the previous amount to 0. This requirement is unique to USDT.

disabled_options.description: Some options might be disabled due to not having a valid bridge configuration
disabled_options.title: Disabled options?

alerts.smartContract: You cannot set the destination owner to a contract address

destOwner.description: You can set a custom address that should be able to claim the transaction on the destination chain, for example if the recipient is a smart contract that cannot manually claim.
destOwner.placeholder: add address that should be able to manually claim...
destOwner.title: Destination owner
destOwner.tooltip: Defaults to your address. You can specify a different address that should be able to claim this transaction.

mint.error: You have already minted your tokens.

rejected.message: An error occurred while attempting to mint the token.
rejected.title: Error minting token

success.message: Check your updated balance on the Bridge page.
success.title: Token minted successfully

tx.message: Track the progress on the explorer here.
tx.title: Transaction sent

mint.unknown_error: Something went wrong, please try again.

warning.insufficient_balance: You don't have enough ETH to complete the transaction. Please add more ETH to your wallet (>= 0.0015 ETH)
warning.no_connected: Please connect your wallet to mint tokens.
warning.not_mintable: This token is not mintable on this network. Please switch to the correct network.
warning.token_minted: You have already minted this token.

wrong_chain.message: It appears you are on the wrong network. Switch to {network} to mint tokens.

errors.not_erc20: This is not a valid ERC20 address on the current network
errors.not_nft: This is not a valid NFT address on the current network

amount.errors.failed_max: Could not estimate max amount to bridge.
amount.label: Amount

pending.message: Please open your wallet to check the current status.
pending.title: Network switch pending

rejected.message: Request to switch network has been rejected by the user.
rejected.title: Network switch rejected

paused_modal.description: The bridge is currently not available. Follow our official communication channels for more information.
paused_modal.title: Bridge under maintenance!

custom.label: Custom
custom.warning: Fees set below the recommended level may not attract any relayers. Please adjust values only if you understand the consequences.

processing_fee.description: The payment you provide to the relayer for handling your bridge message on the destination chain.

gasLimit.message: No other account can pay your gas fees when claiming
gasLimit.title: Only allow sender to claim

warning.message: This will prevent any relayer from claiming for you, you will have to claim manually. Do not use this option if you are not 100% sure what you are doing.

none.alert: Setting the processing fee to 'None' will require manual claiming.  No relayer will claim for you.
none.label: None
none.text: Use ETH to manually claim your bridged token later
none.warning: Insufficient ETH to cover the gas fees for claiming.

recommended.error: Error calculating processing fee, you will need to claim manually!
recommended.label: Recommended

processing_fee.title: Processing fee
processing_fee.tooltip: The payment you provide to the relayer for handling your bridge message on the destination chain.

recipient.description: You can set a custom address as the recipient of your funds, instead of your current wallet address.
recipient.label: incl. fees ~
recipient.title: Recipient address
recipient.tooltip: Defaults to your address. You can add a custom recipient address as well.

relayer_component.description: This component allows you to manually claim any claimable transaction

step2.title: Step 2: Search the transaction you want

relayer_component.title: Relayer Component

switch_modal.description: Your current network is not supported. Please select one of the following chains to proceed:
switch_modal.title: Incorrect network detected

custom_token.description: You can add your own token by entering the contract address below. Make sure you are on the chain where the token is deployed.
custom_token.title: Add your own token

dialog.description: Insufficient balance to claim yourself. Please wait for the relayer to claim for you automatically. Refer to our guide for more information.
dialog.title: Please wait

success.message: Your transaction has been processed. Check the status in your wallet or the explorer here.
success.title: Transaction completed

tx.message: Track the progress on the explorer here.
tx.title: Transaction sent

success.message: Your funds have been released on {network}
success.title: Transaction completed

tx.message: Track the progress on the explorer here.
tx.title: Transaction sent

confirm.claim_description: You can now claim your assets

pre_check.only_destowner_can_claim: This transaction can only be claimed by the destination owner. Please connect to the correct wallet to claim this transaction.
pre_check.ready: You can continue with the claim process!
pre_check.switch_chain: This transaction is bridging to {chain} You need to be connected to this chain
pre_check.title: Requirements

chain.description: You need to be connected to the chain you want to bridge your funds to.
chain.title: What is "Connected to the correct chain"?

funds.description: In order to claim the transaction yourself, you need enough funds on the destination chain (>= 0.0015 ETH). If you've kept the default processing fee, the relayer will likely claim for you soon.
funds.title: What is "Sufficient funds to claim"?

processing_fee.description: A processing fee has been set for this transaction. If the fee is high enough, a relayer may claim it automatically. Regardless, you can choose to manually claim the transaction. Note that the fee is non-refundable.

quota.description: Currently there is a daily limit of how much of this asset can be bridged to L1. If the quota is reached, please try again the next day.
quota.title: What is "Sufficient daily quota"?

errors.insufficient_balance: Insufficient balance to claim yourself. Please wait for the relayer to claim for you automatically. Refer to our guide for more information.
errors.relayer_offline: Relayer did not respond. Your transactions may only be loaded partially.

claim.description: Your asset is now ready for claiming on the destination chain and requires a transaction. If you have set a processing fee, the relayer will automatically handle the claiming process on your behalf.
claim.name: Claim

claimed.description: Your asset has successfully completed the bridging process and is now available to you on the destination chain.
claimed.name: Claimed

dialog.description: The bridge message undergoes different stages:
dialog.title: Message status

pending.description: Your asset is not yet eligible for claiming. The bridging process from CoreRollup to Holesky may take several hours before becoming claimable. Sepolia to CoreRollup bridging should be claimable within minutes.
pending.name: Pending

processing.description: Transaction is processing. Depending on the pending blocks to be verified this can take up to several minutes.
processing.name: Processing

release.description: Your bridged asset cannot be processed and is now accessible to you on the source chain.
release.name: Release

retry.description: The relayer was unable to process this message, and you will need to retry the processing yourself.
retry.name: Retry
